analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x2c176aa3691ef507ff63bac477024593b1f05d1f.sol:
	Contract AvtcToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2c176aa3691ef507ff63bac477024593b1f05d1f.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x2c176aa3691ef507ff63bac477024593b1f05d1f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x2c176aa3691ef507ff63bac477024593b1f05d1f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x2c176aa3691ef507ff63bac477024593b1f05d1f.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
